data.name: ReadCaseAssignmentOffice
data.value: select T1.REASON_CODE, T1.EFFECTIVE_DATE, T1.DISCONTINUE_DATE, T1.CREATED_TIMESTAMP, T1.SPD_ID, T1.OFF_ID, T1.OSP_CODE, T1.OSP_DATE, T1.CAS_NO, T2.OFFICE_ID, T2.OFF_OFFICE from CKT_OFFICE T2 with(readuncommitted) join CKT_ASSIGN_CASE T1 with(readuncommitted) on (T1.EFFECTIVE_DATE <= @effectiveDate) and (@casNo = T1.CAS_NO) and (T1.REASON_CODE = 'RSP') and (T2.OFFICE_ID = T1.OFF_ID) order by T1.DISCONTINUE_DATE desc

data.name: ReadCaseAssignmentOfficeServiceProviderOffice
data.value: select top(1) T1.REASON_CODE, T1.EFFECTIVE_DATE, T1.DISCONTINUE_DATE, T1.CREATED_TIMESTAMP, T1.SPD_ID, T1.OFF_ID, T1.OSP_CODE, T1.OSP_DATE, T1.CAS_NO, T2.DISCONTINUE_DATE, T3.OFF_OFFICE from CKT_OFFICE T3 join CKT_OFFC_SRVC_PRVR T2 join CKT_ASSIGN_CASE T1 on (@casNo = T1.CAS_NO) and (T1.REASON_CODE = 'RSP') and (T1.EFFECTIVE_DATE <= @effectiveDate) and (T1.DISCONTINUE_DATE >= @effectiveDate) and (T2.EFFECTIVE_DATE = T1.OSP_DATE) and (T2.ROLE_CODE = T1.OSP_CODE) and (T2.OFF_GENERATED_ID = T1.OFF_ID) and (T2.SPD_GENERATED_ID = T1.SPD_ID) and (T2.EFFECTIVE_DATE <= @effectiveDate) and (T2.DISCONTINUE_DATE > @effectiveDate) on T3.OFFICE_ID = T2.OFF_GENERATED_ID join CKT_OFFC_SRVC_PRVR T4 on (T3.OFFICE_ID = T4.OFF_GENERATED_ID) and (T4.EFFECTIVE_DATE <= @effectiveDate) and (T4.DISCONTINUE_DATE > @effectiveDate) and (@spdGeneratedId = T4.SPD_GENERATED_ID)

data.name: ReadCaseRoleCase
data.value: select T1.CAS_NUMBER, T1.CSP_NUMBER, T1.TYPE, T1.CASE_ROLE_ID, T2.STATUS, T2.OFFICE_IDENTIFIER from CKT_CASE T2 join CKT_CASE_ROLE T1 on (@cspNumber = T1.CSP_NUMBER) and (T2.NUMB = T1.CAS_NUMBER)

data.name: ReadCsePerson
data.value: select top(1) NUMB from CKT_CSE_PERSON where NUMB = @numb

data.name: ReadOffice
data.value: select distinct T1.OFFICE_ID, T1.OFF_OFFICE from CKT_OFFICE T1 with(readuncommitted) join CKT_OFFC_SRVC_PRVR T2 with(readuncommitted) on (T1.OFFICE_ID = T2.OFF_GENERATED_ID) and (@spdGeneratedId = T2.SPD_GENERATED_ID) and (T2.EFFECTIVE_DATE <= @effectiveDate) and (T2.DISCONTINUE_DATE >= @effectiveDate)

data.name: ReadServiceProvider
data.value: select top(1) SERVICE_PRVDER_ID, USER_ID from CKT_SERVICE_PRVDER where USER_ID = @userId
